para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The axis telescopic covers prevent chips and coolant from entering the inside of the feed axis.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Axis telescopic covers consist of the following.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left ; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left ;
li.text: X-axis telescopic cover: There are a total of two identical X-axis telescopic covers required for each machine. Each cover is mounted between the table and the saddle covers on each end of the saddle.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left ;
li.text: Y-axis telescopic cover: There are a total of two identical Y-axis telescopic covers required for each machine. Each cover is mounted from the saddle to their respective front and rear telescopic frame with a seal sandwiched in between to prevent leakage.

li.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left ;
li.text: Z-axis telescopic cover: Only one Z-axis telescopic cover is required for each machine. One end of the cover is mounted onto the Y-axis telescopic frame (rear) and the other end is mounted onto the spindle casting.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left ;

image.src: Fig 2.1 X,Y and Z Telescopic Cover_edit.png

para.text: X, Y and Z Telescopic Cover
